with budgets up to 350 million Synchronized multiple financial databases to collect more than 5000 a month over the course of eight months in previously lost revenue for DMV services Entrusted with PlanningOBP on the status of why an Agency for the Government Service Cluster either has a spending pressure or under spending for each quarter of the Fiscal year Performed routine database management
